name: WildeKey
description:
Educational game to learn & practice touch typing, levels introduce more of the keyboard and take on the boss at the end of each world!

Controls: 

- Move: Enter (to switch lanes)

- Interact: Simply type out the word

- Overworld Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

- Enter Level: Enter

Made in a Senior CS independent study across the 2020-2021 academic year at Sandy Spring Friends School. 

Created by: Micah Vargas (Co-Developer), Ian Stedham (Co-Developer), and Brian Wilkinson (Mentor). Sound effects provided by SSFS lower-schoolers. 

WildeKey is also hosted at: games.ssfs.org
